titleInfo.title: Poets and Prophets series featuring Paul Overstreet

mods.abstract: Two color window card (yellow and burgundy on white) announcing Poets and Prophets series with Paul Overstreet, writer of On the Other Hand, Forever and Ever, Amen, and others at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 8. The Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum's Poets and Prophets series celebrates legendary songwriters with interviews and performances to understand how songwriters work behind the scene to create famous songs.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
